body: Say if someone wanted to make a clan, how would he do it?
body_tagged: Say if someone wanted to make a clan, how would he do it?
title: How to make a clan?

replies.body: He/She would create a forum post under the "Teams" sections. This post would most likely contain the roster, team name, and scrim record. You can do other things to spice it up if you wish :D
replies.body_tagged: He/She would create a forum post under the "Teams" sections. This post would most likely contain the roster, team name, and scrim record. You can do other things to spice it up if you wish :D

replies.body: And a scrim is? You know just in case this person doesn't know :P
replies.body_tagged: And a scrim is? You know just in case this person doesn't know :P

reply_to.body: He/She would create a forum post under the "Teams" sections. This post would most likely contain the roster, team name, and scrim record. You can do other things to spice it up if you wish :D
reply_to.body_tagged: He/She would create a forum post under the "Teams" sections. This post would most likely contain the roster, team name, and scrim record. You can do other things to spice it up if you wish :D

replies.body: A "scrim" is short for scrimmage. This is a competition between two teams. Most of these matches are DTM, CTW, or TDM.
replies.body_tagged: A "scrim" is short for scrimmage. This is a competition between two teams. Most of these matches are DTM, CTW, or TDM.

reply_to.body: And a scrim is? You know just in case this person doesn't know :P
